entities.name: cattermole
entities.description: Cattermole is a Ministry worker who is being addressed by Yaxley. He is requested to sort out Yaxley's office.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is a Death Eater who witnessed Dumbledore's death and is now addressing Cattermole.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the Ministry workers who are present when Yaxley approaches them. He feels fear rippling through them.

relationships.description: Yaxley addresses Cattermole and requests him to sort out his office.
Harry feels fear when Yaxley approaches them.
